author: James Doe
comment: The overall app is good, like the rest of the apps for sports (such as sofascores and livescores). Tho 365scores prices for tips are laughable, I wouldn't recommend anyone using that feature.

author: Asim Gyawali
comment: Overall, i like this app. I am habituated with this app and i don't think i need to download other apps to see scores and highlights. But, in this app highlights are not well managed which i would rate 9 if it was out of 10. So Please, make the highlights able to be viewed directly from the app. Then, it will make my life easier. ☺️

author: Armen Vardanyan
comment: is it soooo difficult to fix this time problem? since more than a year you cant fix this issue, its annoying and thats why many of users uninstalling your soft...fix it guyssss

reply.author: 365Scores LTD
reply.content:
Firstly, Thanks for using our app!
We apologise for the bad experience. We want to help you as best we can. 
Could you please send us a feedback from the application (Settings > send us feedback button), with your name and the details of the issue so we will be able to recognize your user profile and try to resolve this issue.
All the best

author: sherif ahmed
comment: Why u removed the leagues statistics including top goal scorers, Whats wrong with this app

reply.author: 365Scores LTD
reply.content:
Firstly, thanks for using our app! 
Unfortunately we experienced some problems but we fixed it.
Let us know if there's anything else we can assist you with, we are happy to help.
For more information, check out our FAQ
Kind Regards,

author: Jeff Seale
comment: Android Wear notifications sometimes come up blank unless I swipe my display a bit. Those that do display don't even fit the round watch screen.

reply.author: 365Scores LTD
reply.content: Hi Jeff, Thanks for your feedback. Apologies for the bad experience. We are always to improve the videos. Due to licencing restrictions we do not host the videos. Thanks.

author: Tushar Devkar
comment: I would love to sync my settings n preferences of teams n competition to social apps or cloud.. So that I wont be facing struggle of resetting preferences all over again when i switch devices or reinstall this app

reply.author: 365Scores LTD
reply.content:
Hi, Thanks for using our app! We greatly appreciate your positive feedback about the app! We are happy to have another satisfied user! 
When you set up email, the app recognizes and pulls your 365scores settings.
Unfortunately this option does not exist in case you change operating system.
Let what know what else we can help with.
All the best
